name: Ran Liao
body:
### Welcome to Ran Liao's Page.
[Ran Liao](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ran-liao-7b629298), Ph.D  (expected in August 2016)

E-Mail:ranliao0624(AT)outlook(DOT)com

* Ph.D candidate, major in **Biostatistics**, minor in **Epidemiology** in [Indiana University, Fairbank's School of Public Health, Department of Biostatistics](http://biostat.iupui.edu/)

* Master of Science, major in ** Applied Mathematics** in [Beijing University of Aeronautics & Astronauti](http://www.buaa.edu.cn/)

* Bachelor of Science, dual major in **Applied Mathematics** and **Economics** in [Xiamen University](http://www.xmu.edu.cn/en/)

### Who is Ran?

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/topran/ranliao/30797174adef25f81153b688254b55d077947895/images/github_pic.jpg)

+ Ran is a **professional statistician**, **data scientist**, and **quantitative analyst**. 

+ Ran has seven year's research **applied mathematician** background and hands-on **data analysis** and **statistical consulting** experience.

+ Ran has advanced **R and SAS programming** experience, strong **coding**, and **modeling** background.

+ Ran is very passionate about tracking **big data challenges** using machine learning, map reducing, Hadoop methodologies.

### Current Status of Ran
Ph.D candidate at [Indiana University, Fairbank's School of Public Health, Department of Biostatistics](http://biostat.iupui.edu/)

Research Assistant at [Indiana University Health](http://iuhealth.org/) 

Research Biostatistician at  [Regenstrief Institute](https://www.regenstrief.org/)

### Recent News of Ran
Ran's Ph.D defense will be in the coming fall semester.

Ran will join [Eli Lilly and Company](https://www.lilly.com/home.aspx) in September 2016
